channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoho Marketing Automation -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-37225|2024-07-12T16:59:20.352Z -- zoho%20marketing%20automation -- zoho%20marketing%20automation
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in Zoho Marketing Automation.This issue affects Zoho Marketing Automation: from n/a through 1.2.7.
